jobs.title: Store Keeper
jobs.description:
Looking for a dedicated store keeper to
        manage inventory and maintain store cleanliness.
        Responsibilities include receiving shipments, 
        organizing stock, and assisting customers.

jobs.title: Loading Boy
jobs.description:
Looking for an energetic person to off-load 
        construction materials(cement, iron rod, roofing sheet etc)
         anytime the truck arrived with the materials.

jobs.title: Fuel Atendant
jobs.description:
Looking for a person who is willing to
       work at filling station to service costomers in a 
       respectful manner.

jobs.title: Carpenter
jobs.description:
Looking for someone to be cuting
       logs and boards using powered machinery will also 
        be carpentry works.
